casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Wayne Thomas JOHNSON. No. 119P00-16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney Generals, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of April 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
